1139740.name: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage
1139740.description: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage is a 2D platformer inspired by the 16-bit era. Play as Aqua, a brave TentaCat estranged from his homeland on a quest to defeat the sinister Dr. Polaris and save his kind from the Doctor's wicked experiments. Explore 12 meticulously designed levels packed with unique enemies, power-ups, and challenging boss battles as you rescue your fellow TentaCats and uncover the mysteries surrounding their origin.
